name: Surge - FPS Dash Game
description:
Surge

Developed by Thomas Drechsler und Maximilian Meinicke

Surge is an FPS-Plattforming Game. Players have to reach the end of each Level (green Sphere) in a simple neon City.  The main Mechanic is a Dash which can be reset by collecting the Dashresets. As an extra Mechanic Players can slow the time to aim the dash precisely in air. The Prototype has 4 Levels which have to be selected through the menu.

Controlls

Mouse - Aim

W, A, S, D - Move

Leerstaste - Jump

Left Mousebutton - Dash

Hold Leftmousebutton - Timeslow

B - Menu

Backspace - load Checkpoint
Enter - reload Level

Dev Options

F1- set Checkpoint

Known Bugs:

The players can fall eternally in some Levels and have to use Backspace or Enter to reload.
